comment: Device did not provide all the necessary information when registering
Device should not attempt to register with this name
Device should not attempt to register with this MAC
Device should not attempt to register anymore
Data received from the device was ok
Device provided data with either malformed JSON or in an unexpected format
Device provided data with an unexpected timestamp
Instruct node-reporter to wait before sending anymore data
Instruct node-reporter to wait before re-sending the data just sent
